description: This file defines the BaggageBeltController class, a REST controller in a Spring Boot application that handles CRUD operations for baggage belts. It includes endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, listing, and deleting baggage belt entities, utilizing various DTOs and a repository for persistence.

classes.name: BaggageBeltController
classes.description: A REST controller managing CRUD operations for baggage belts, including create, read, update, delete, and list functionalities, utilizing a repository and DTOs for data handling.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new baggage belt after validating uniqueness of beltCode; returns the created baggage belt response.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a baggage belt by its UUID, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all baggage belts.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Performs a full update on an existing baggage belt, ensuring beltCode uniqueness.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a baggage belt by its UUID, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a BaggageBeltEntity to its response DTO.
